Title: Chapter 45
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Laura Eason, Laura Eason (executive story editor), Bill Kennedy (executive story editor)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Mahershala Ali
Plot: Claire clashes with the Secretary of State Durant over her involvement in negotiations with Russia. Dunbar must choose between her campaign and her ethics.
